entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 March 2023
